properties.sfomuseum:description: Two-page advertisement from February 1, 1947 issue of Saturday Evening Post promoting Pan American World Airways, titled “We felt the lure of Latin America the instant we boarded the Clipper / That extra something that makes ‘going by Clipper’ a delightful experience”; contains color illustration of flight attendant greeting seated passengers, with smaller images depicting tourist destinations in Rio de Janeiro, Mexico, and Guatemala.
